content: Perhaps we should file an issue on cargo?

Thanks for the report, I'll look into it. I don't see how it would be possible since the test is supposed to enforce a specific sequence of actions that should always lead to the expected error.

If you ever see a cargo test fail on CI, please file an issue. We track them (https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3AA-testing-cargo-itself), and I endeavor to try to avoid flaky tests.
